plot: Satchyat Aat Gharaat is a Marathi movie released in 2004. Produced by Smita Talwalkar and directed by Sanjay Surkar. The movie is based on a bunch of young boys and girls who grapple with the issue of morality in today's changing scenario.
title: Saatchya Aat Gharat
